title: Drawing, "Achilles Drags the Body of Hector", ca. 1790
medium: Pen and brown ink on light blue laid paper
markings: Watermark: double oval with lily, above, F
inscribed: Inscribed: Furia dachille contro il corpo dettore
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Achilles looks from his chariot at the dragged body. At left horrified Trojans look on.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Achilles Drags the Body of Hector", ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. Pen and brown ink on light blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3292.
